String.string: Use the {@LinkCreature:2500#2502#Forest of the Fallen Teleportal} or the {@LinkCreature:2501#1502#Teleportal} to reach the {@LinkTerritory:2502#250200001#Forest of the Fallen}.
Listen to Lok, and then follow him.
Go where Lok asked you to.
Defeat {@LinkCreature:2502#502#Corrupted Divine Guardian} and {@LinkCreature:2502#500#Corrupted Divine Guardian}.
Enter the ward and help Lok.
